item.title: Michele add a quote by Joanne Fluke
item.description: "IT was the time of day when Lake Eden residents decided it was too late for a breakfast cookie and too early for a lunch cookie." -- Joanne Fluke

item.title: Michele add a quote by Joanne Fluke
item.description: "P.S. If it's not a secret, will you tell me how you got my dollhouse inside our living room last Christmas? I know its too big to fit down the chimney. I measured." -- Joanne Fluke

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Is that a bulletproof vest? See, now that's so insulting. That's like saying I'm not smart enough to shoot you in the head." Eddie DeChooch" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "My professional aspirations were simple - I wanted to be an intergalactic princess." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I hate mornings. They start so early." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Calories don’t count if they’re connected to a celebration. Everyone knows this." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "How many times have I told you not to hit people in the face. You kick them in the body where it doesn't show." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Some men go a lifetime and never have their kid blow up a car, but I have a daughter who's knocked off three cars and burned down a funeral home. Maybe that's some kind of record." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description:
"The elevator doors opened, and Ranger stepped out and spied Tank stretched out on the carpet.
"Fainted," I said.
Ranger walked to Tank and stood hands on hips, staring down at him. "Tank doesn't faint. I've been in firefights with him. He's a rock."
"Well, the rock fainted." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "There is no such thing as a good call at 7 AM. It's been my experience that all calls between the hours of 11 PM and 9 AM are disaster calls." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Maybe next time we just open the door and start out with some bitch slapping." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Lula had Eminem cranked up. He was rapping about trailer park girls and how they go round the outside, and I was wondering what the heck that meant. I'm a white girl from Trenton. I don't know these things. I need a rap cheat sheet." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Its always nice to have a stud muffin at the table." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I met a real looker. He picked me up at the two dollar slot machines, so you know he's no cheapskate." Grandma Mazur" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I always wanted to eat with a Negro,” Grandma said. Yeah, well I always wanted to eat with a boney- assed old white woman,” Lula said. “So I guess this works out good." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "You think I'm gonna feel better eatin' a carrot? Get a grip. There's two idiots out there trying to kill me, and you think I'm gonna waste my last breath on a vegetable? (Lula)" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Ranger sent us to check on you," Hal said. "We just got here, and we heard shots." "Some moron ate my jelly doughnut," Lula said. "So I shot him." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description:
"I checked my phone messages. Three in all.
The first was from Joe. “Hey, Cupcake.” That was it. That was the whole message.
The second was from Ranger. “Yo.” Ranger made Joe look like a chatterbox." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "When I was six years old I sprinkled sugar on my head, convinced myself it was pixie dust, wished myself invisible, and walked into the boys' bathroom at school." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I have bad car juju." -Stephanie Plum" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I wasn't sure exactly how prostitutes determined price, but if men bought hookers by the pound, these two would be doing okay." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Okay, take a deep breath, I told myself. Don't go all hormonal. Get the facts straight. Have a mental doughnut." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "That’s nice of you, but it’s not necessary to loan me a car.” “I loan you cars all the time.” “And I almost always destroy them or lose them. I have terrible luck with cars.” “Working at Rangeman is a high-stress job, and you’re one of our few sources of comic relief. I give you a car and my men start a pool on how long it will take you to trash it. You’re a line item in my budget under entertainment." -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "It's been almost a month since you found a body. I knew you were due." Carl Costanza - Seven Up" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Michele add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description:
"I went to the door, and Gary tried hard not to notice I was blue. He looked at his feet, and he looked above my head, and he cleared his throat.
It's okay,' I said. 'I know I'm blue.'
It caught me by surprise,' he said. 'I didn't want to seem rude." -- Janet Evanovich
